attributes.action: Stop the work force discriminating Epileptics getting jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have been a Epileptic for 34 years.In that time i have had 3 fits.The last scan i had done (EEG) said i still have a high level of electricity linked to Epilepsy in my Brain.
I have applied for several jobs, one for a large supermarket chain .Who in turn said Epileptics were a liability to the shop.The second was a cancer charity shop who refused to employ me because , i spoke the truth on my application form.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
